Player History
Injured on 8/27/2001 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/27/2002, off Mike Koplove (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/15/2002, off Chuck Finley (BOS)...
Injured on 4/3/2005 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Kansas City to San Diego on 1/31/2006 (Going to KC: P W. Miller, P C. Shoup. Going to SDN: C J. Closser)...
Injured on 8/4/2006 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Florida on 4/1/2011 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/12/2011 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Released by Florida on 11/5/2011...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/2/2013 to a minor league deal...
Drafted in 5th round, 122nd overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Released by Boston on 3/2/2016...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/1/2018 to a minor league contract.
Released by St. Louis on 4/1/2019...
Drafted in 3rd round, 79th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2020...
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1977...
Injured on 8/16/1979 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/29/1980 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 2/10/1981 (Going to HOU: C O. Virgil Jr., P D. Daboll, P G. Heimueller, P J. Price. Going to CIN: C S. Chilcott, P N. Ryan, P S. McDowell)...
Earned first career win on 5/14/1984...
Injured on 5/14/1985 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
